title: San Juan County, Washington - Private Property

sections.title: Emergency
sections.content:
**Property Address:** 667 Bear Cove Rd, Deer Harbor, WA 98243

**Status:** Documented

### Generator Instructions
**Steps to switch to generator power:**
1. Start generator
2. Turn off House Main Switch #1
3. Turn off main Switch on panel #2
4. Switch #3 Transfer Switch to Gen. set
5. Turn on House Main Switch #1
6. Turn on Main Switch on panel #2

**To switch back to OPALCO power:**
1. Turn off House Main Switch #1
2. Turn off main Switch on panel #2
3. Switch #3 Transfer Switch to OPALCO
4. Turn off generator
5. Turn on House Main Switch #1
6. Turn on Main Switch on panel #2

### Critical Contacts
- **Emergency:** 911
- **Caretaker (Joseph):** 360-982-9705
- **Caretaker (Lilliana):** 360-317-6121
- **Power (OPALCO):** 360-376-3500

subsections.content:

1. Start generator
2. Turn off House Main Switch #1

**To switch back to OPALCO power:**
1. Turn off House Main Switch #1

3. Switch #3 Transfer Switch to OPALCO
4. Turn off generator
5. Turn on House Main Switch #1
6. Turn on Main Switch on panel #2

sections.title: Farm House
sections.content:
### Structure & Exterior
- **Type:** Wood-frame farmhouse with traditional root cellar (built into hillside)
- **Exterior:** Wood siding with distinctive green/teal trim
- **Roof:** Gray asphalt shingles with dormers

### Kitchen Appliances
- LG top-freezer refrigerator, white, Model LRTP0931W, 115V 60Hz 1.5A, Refrigerant R134a, Made in Korea. ([View Manual](https://www.appliancefactoryparts.com/content/pdfs/161181-1.pdf)) Located in green kitchen next to exterior door with glass panes. Toaster and crackers on counter beside it.
- Close-up of LG model label: Model LRTP0931W, 115V~ 60Hz 1.5A, Refrigerant R134a 120g, CSA File No. LR41087, Free Standing Installation Only, Made in Korea.
- White electric range, 4-burner coil cooktop with oven and storage/broiler drawer. Tea kettle on top. Next to green beadboard cabinets. Brand/model unknown.
- "Use and Care Manual and Installation Instructions - Electric Range" manual cover page. Generic manual, no brand visible.
- Back of electric range showing wiring diagram, terminal board access panel, bodily injury and electrical shock hazard warnings, anti-tip bracket installation diagram. No serial/model plate found.

### Systems & Utilities
- Flush-mounted breaker panel on interior wall, door closed.
- MTS manual transfer switch (Kylander Electric, Everett WA) with generator interlock, opened showing breakers and circuit directory. Panel directory shows circuits: Bath, Bed Room, Range, Smoke Det, Heat, Water, Dining, Kitchen, and others. "CAUTION HAZARDOUS VOLTAGE" warning label. Power from generator / power from utility switching.

### Water Heater (Critical)
- Bradford White automatic storage water heater with PHCC label, in utility/laundry closet. Copper plumbing visible on top with flexible connectors.
- Bradford White label close-up: Model MI150S6DS21, Serial ZB2783563, 50 gallon (189.3 liters), 240V AC only 50/60 Hz, Upper Element 4500W, Lower Element 4500W, Max 4500W, Test pressure 300 psi, Working 150 psi. EnergyGuide: 4721 kWh/year, estimated $397/year, first hour rating 67 gallons. ([View Manual](https://docs.bradfordwhite.com/I&O/238-54649-00_Current.pdf))

### Exterior
- Exterior shot showing hose bib/water spigot area along cedar shingle siding with green rabbit cutout decoration, raised garden beds adjacent. Crawl space access area.
- In-ground valve box (water shutoff or irrigation valve) near the foundation, opened showing dirt and debris inside with visible pipe/valve at bottom.
- Removable board access panel at foundation level, between siding and raised garden bed. Orange extension cord running through area. Moss and gravel ground cover.

### Root Cellar
- Log construction root cellar built into hillside, gable roof, weathered wood door with window pane. Rustic wooden gate in front, large boulders and flagstone path, dried hydrangeas, forest hillside with tall conifers behind.
- Interior with skylights in sloped ceiling providing natural light. Currently used as garden storage: galvanized trash cans, buckets, garden tools, dried herbs hanging from line, green garden hose, Roundup, spray cans, Dr. Earth fertilizer, birdhouses on shelf, old crosscut saw on wall, shelving on left wall.

### Interior
- Room with quilted wall hanging (blue/green/floral banner pattern with tassel), white spindle chair, baseboard heater visible at floor level, light switch and outlet on wall. Yellow walls with green trim/baseboards.
-King brand analog dial thermostat, "Comfort Zone" label, range LO through 50-60-70-80-90\u00b0F. Controls baseboard heaters. Red tulip wall clock above it. ([View Manual](https://king-electric.com/wp-content/uploads/kel_product_files/K101-K102-Instructions-Manual.pdf))

- Bradford White label close-up: Model MI150S6DS21, Serial ZB2783563, 50 gallon (189.3 liters), 240V AC only 50/60 Hz, Upper Element 4500W, Lower Element 4500W, Max 4500W, Test pressure 300 psi, Working 150 psi. subsections.intro:
### ⚠️ URGENT: Replacement Needed
**Bradford White Water Heater**
- **Model:** MI150S6DS21
- **Serial:** ZB2783563
- **Age:** 25 years (Feb 2001)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK

**Why This Is Urgent:**
At 25 years old, this unit is more than double its expected lifespan. Risks include catastrophic tank failure, flooding, and safety hazards.

**Immediate Actions:**
1. Check daily for leaks.
2. Listen for unusual noises.
3. **Schedule replacement immediately.**

sections.title: Beach House
sections.content:
**Parcel:** [To be documented] - [View on Polaris GIS](https://gis.sanjuancountywa.gov/polaris/)

### Utilities & Systems
- **Water Shutoff:** Exterior access box near main entry by "Lighthouse Point" sign (Blue-handled ball valve)
- **WiFi:** Network: **Ned&Haleh** | Password: **Beachhouse1**
- **Security:** First Alert FA260 Professional alarm system - [View Manual](https://seisecurity.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/02/FA260RF_User_Guide.pdf)

### Appliances
- **Refrigerator:** LG LRBP1031T (19 years old) - *Rec. Replace Immediately* - [View Manual](https://gscs-b2c.lge.com/downloadFile?fileId=KROWM000020693.pdf)
- **Range:** Bosch Electric (Stainless steel, ceramic cooktop) - [View Manual](https://media3.bosch-home.com/Documents/9000087183_A.pdf)
- **Dishwasher:** Bosch 300 Series SHP53C06UC30 (~7 years old) - [View Manual](https://media3.bosch-home.com/Documents/9001218495_A.pdf)
- **Washer:** Maytag MHW8200FC0 (8 years old) - [View Manual](https://www.maytag.com/content/dam/global/documents/201906/owners-manual-W10775517-RevB.pdf)
- **Dryer:** Maytag MED8200FC2 (8 years old) - [View Manual](https://c.searspartsdirect.com/doc/1603405L)

### Water Heater
- **Model:** Bradford White M265R6DS-1NCWM - [View Manual](https://docs.bradfordwhite.com/I&O/238-54649-00_Current.pdf)
- **Serial:** DD9041943
- **Age:** 22 years (2004)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK (Expected life 8-12 years)
- **Action:** Replace immediately

subsections.title: Water Heater (Critical)
subsections.content:
### ⚠️ URGENT: Replacement Needed
**Bradford White Water Heater**
- **Model:** M265R6DS-1NCWW
- **Serial:** DD9041943
- **Capacity:** 65 gallons (246 liters)
- **Type:** Electric, 240/208V, 1-Phase AC
- **Upper Element:** 4500/3500 Watts
- **Lower Element:** 4500/3500 Watts
- **Age:** 22 years (2004)
- **Status:** CRITICAL FAILURE RISK

**Why This Is Urgent:**
At 22 years old, this unit is significantly beyond its expected lifespan (8–12 years). Risks include tank failure, flooding, and loss of hot water.

**Immediate Actions:**
1. Monitor for leaks.
2. **Budget for immediate replacement.**

sections.content:

sections.title: The Chalet
sections.content:
**Status:** Documented

### Structure & Exterior
- **Foundation:** Pier foundation
- **Exterior:** Board-and-batten siding, painted tan/beige
- **Rear:** Elevated deck with stairs and wire-mesh railing
- **Front:** Covered porch with columns, water views

### Heating & Comfort
- **Thermostat (Zone 1 – Bedroom):** King Comfort Zone dial thermostat (by King Electric)
- **Thermostat (Zone 2 – Living Area):** King Comfort Zone dial thermostat (by King Electric)
- **Gas Stove:** Vermont Castings Jefferson Direct Vent Gas Stove
  - **Model:** JDV RP | **Serial:** 2684
  - **Fuel:** Propane | **Input:** 19,000 BTUH | **Output:** 28,000 BTUH (19,600 BTUH Canadian rating)
  - **Manufacturer:** Vermont Castings Majestic Products, Bethel, VT
  - **Certified:** ANSI Z21.88B-1998, CGA 2.33B-M98
  - **Supply Pressure (Propane):** 11.0– 13.0” W.C. | **Manifold Pressure:** 10.0” W.C.
  - [View Manual](https://manuals.fire-parts.com/aws-assets/vermont-castings-jefferson-jdv-2820-jefferson_jdv_2820_install-pdf.pdf)

### Electrical
- **Panel:** Square D QO Load Center (Cat. No. QOC-20M, Series B1), wall-mounted with cedar trim - [View Manual](https://download.schneider-electric.com/files?p_Doc_Ref=S1B33894&p_enDocType=Instruction+sheet&p_File_Name=S1B33894.pdf)
- **Circuit Directory:** Heat (×2 zones), Water Heater, Bedrooms, Living Room, Kitchen, Bathroom, Basement, Microwave

### Kitchenette
- **Refrigerator:** Danby Designer (Compact under-counter model)
- **Microwave:** Countertop model
- **Sink:** Single basin stainless steel

### Systems
- **Water Heater:** Rheem 30 Gallon Electric (Model: 81V30D) - [View Manual](https://files.rheem.com/blobazrheem/wp-content/uploads/sites/2/AP21831-Rev-2-SHEG-TriBrand-UC.pdf)

### Maintenance Notes
- **Winterization:** Ensure wall heaters are set to frost protection (approx. 45°F) during winter months.
- **Water Heater:** Drain 1-2 gallons annually to remove sediment.

  - **Manufacturer:** Vermont Castings Majestic Products, Bethel, VT
  - **Certified:** ANSI Z21.88B-1998, CGA 2.33B-M98
  - **Supply Pressure (Propane):** 11.0– 13.0” W.C. | **Manifold Pressure:** 10.0” W.C.
  - [View Manual](https://manuals.fire-parts.com/aws-assets/vermont-castings-jefferson-jdv-2820-jefferson_jdv_2820_install-pdf.pdf)

sections.title: Camp Kitchen
sections.content:
**Status:** Documented

### Structure
- **Type:** Open-air timber frame pavilion with metal roof
- **Flooring:** Concrete slab
- **Lighting:** Overhead string lights and task lighting

### Appliances
- **Stove:** Propane Range (4-burner with oven)
- **Refrigerator:** Full-size Refrigerator/Freezer
- **Grill:** Weber Genesis II (Propane, 3-burner) - [View Manual](https://www.weber.com/on/demandware.static/-/Library-Sites-library-apac/en_JP/v1562868910965/pdf/Gas/Genesis%20II/E310%20E410%20GBS/User%20Guide%20EN/59460_040118_WEB.pdf)
- **Prep Area:** Large stainless steel prep table

### Utilities & Systems
- **Water Heater:** Rinnai Tankless Water Heater (Model: V53e) - [View Manual](https://media.rinnai.us/salsify_asset/s-38321af7-24bd-49ca-84c5-e554a678661f/100000256-V53e%20Installation%20and%20Operation%20Manual.pdf)
- **Electrical:**
  - **Transformer Enclosure:** Located near Camp Kitchen (Green box)
  - **Meter & Shutoff:** Located by Camp Kitchen
  - **Sub-panel:** Dedicated panel serving kitchen circuits
- **Water:**
  - **Supply:** Outdoor sink with hot/cold water
  - **Exterior Spigot:** Located on Camp Kitchen exterior
  - **Winterization:** Must be drained in freezing months
- **Outlets:** Multiple outdoor-rated GFCI outlets for small appliances

### Maintenance Notes
- **Winterization:** Shut off water supply and drain lines to prevent freezing. Cover grill.
- **Propane:** Check tank levels before large gatherings.

sections.title: Caretaker House
sections.content:
**Status:** Documented

### Kitchen Appliances
- **Dishwasher:** KitchenAid Model KDFE104DBL5 (Black, built-in) - [View Manual](https://www.kitchenaid.com/content/dam/global/documents/201808/owners-manual-w10751712-rev-c.pdf)
- **Microwave:** GE Sensor Microwave Oven (White/cream, countertop, no model/serial available)
- **Refrigerator:** Frigidaire Model FFHS2622MSNA, Serial 4A44813686 (Black, side-by-side with ice/water dispenser, manufactured 12/2014, ~11 years old, 8.50A 115V) - [View Manual](https://c.searspartsdirect.com/doc/1310215L)
- **Range:** Whirlpool Model WFC310S0EB1, Serial R81030795 (Black, 4-burner coil cooktop with oven, 120/208-240V, 8.8-11.7 KW) - [View Manual](https://www.whirlpool.com/content/dam/global/documents/201406/owners-manual-W10719733-RevA.pdf)

### Laundry
- **Washer:** Whirlpool Model WFW4T20RW0, Serial CD3700848 (12.0A, 120V) - [View Manual](https://www.whirlpool.com/content/dam/global/documents/202412/owners-manual-w11735098-reva.pdf)
- **Dryer:** Whirlpool Model WED7500GW0, Serial M74416721 (120/208V 23A or 120/240V 24A) - [View Manual](https://www.concordpacific.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/03/Whirlpool_Dryer_YWED7500.pdf)

### Water Heater
- **Bradford White** Model RE350T6-1NCWW, Serial SB40976517 - [View Manual](https://docs.bradfordwhite.com/I&O/238-54649-00_Current.pdf) (50 gallon, Electric, 240V/208V, 4500W upper/lower elements)

### Heating
- **Wood Stove:** Fisher cast iron wood stove with blower motor, on brick hearth
- **Furnace:** Thermo Pride Oil-Fired Furnace, No. AR773354, Model OC2 56D, oil burner TP-1401 (0.55 GPH, 120 PSI, 115V, 70,000 BTU input / 57,000 BTU output, 14.55 total amps) - [View Manual](https://www.manualslib.com/manual/170200/Thermo-Pride-Oc2-56.html)
- **Thermostat:** Honeywell ProSeries (programmable, Heat/Cool modes) - [Support Page](https://www.honeywellhome.com/us/en/support/air/thermostats/product-selector/manuals/)

### Fuel
- Two exterior above-ground oil tanks: Green tank (left) for house furnace, Silver/white tank (right) for generator

### Structure & Exterior
- Dark green vertical board siding, metal roof, stone chimney
- Crawl space access on exterior with junction box above
- Water shutoff located in crawl space

### Electrical
- **Main Breaker Panel:** Load center with handwritten circuit directory
- **Transfer Switch:** MTS Manual Transfer Switch (Generator to Utility Power) by Elanor Electric, Everett WA
- **Maximum Rating:** 100 Amps
- **Panel Directory:** Includes circuits for range, dryer, bathroom water, hot water, lights, club, panel, utility room, washer, kitchen living, bathroom, appliances, office, laundry, and boot room

sections.title: Genset Shed
sections.description: Backup power generator system serving the Caretaker House, Farm House, and Beach House. Northern Lights Series 3 with John Deere 4039D diesel engine, 36/40kW.

subsections.title: Exterior
subsections.content: The genset shed has green/sage vertical board siding with a metal roof, located on the lawn near the tree line and apple trees.

images.caption: Exterior view of the generator shed. Green/sage vertical board siding, metal roof, gable end facing camera. On lawn near tree line with apple trees nearby.

subsections.title: Interior
subsections.content: The interior currently has gym equipment (Nautilus weights, power rack, bench) stored in front of the generator, blocking access. This is a maintenance priority — see maintenance checklist item #8.

images.caption: Interior overview showing gym equipment (Nautilus weights 25lbs/11.3kg, power rack, bench) stored in front of the generator, blocking access. Generator visible in back.

subsections.title: Generator Equipment
subsections.content:
**Northern Lights Series 3 Generator** — [Operator's Manual](https://www.northern-lights.com/media/PDFs/manual_pdfs/ONL944.pdf)
- **Serial:** LM176191-1294
- **Part:** 36081853
- **Output:** 36 kW (Prime) / 40 kW (Standby)
- **Voltage:** 120/240V, 150A
- **Engine Hours:** ~345 (Feb 2026)

**John Deere Engine** — [Operator's Manual](https://csdieselgenerators.com/Images/Generators/2079/John_Deere_300_3029_4039_4045_6059_6068_engine_operation_and_service_manual.pdf)
- **Model:** 4039DF001
- **Serial:** T04039D474319
- **Manufacturer:** Deere & Company, Moline, Illinois

images.caption: Northern Lights diesel genset on steel skid frame. John Deere diesel engine (white/cream), radiator with fan on left end, large alternator on right. Electrical distribution panel and disconnect switches mounted on wall behind.

Northern Lights Series 3 Generator Set Control Panel (Alaska Diesel Electric Inc., Seattle, USA). VDO gauges: Oil Pressure, Engine Temperature, DC Voltage, Engine Hours (~00345 hours). Shutdown Bypass & Preheat Switch, Engine Control (Run/Start/Stop).
Northern Lights nameplate: Serial LM176191-1294, Part 36081853, KW 36/40, KVA 36/40, Volts 120/240, Amps 150, Duty Prime/Standby. Alaska Diesel Electric, 4420 14th Ave NW, Seattle WA 98107.
John Deere engine plate: Engine Serial Number T04039D474319, Model 4039DF001, Deere & Company, Moline, Illinois, Made in USA.

subsections.title: Electrical & Transfer Switch
subsections.content:
**Power Switchover — To Generator:**
1. Turn on OPALCO flood light
2. Turn main switch to OFF
3. Start generator — warm up
4. Turn main switch to GENSET

**Power Switchover — To OPALCO:**
1. Turn main switch to OFF
2. Turn off generator
3. Turn main switch to OPALCO
4. Turn off OPALCO flood light

**Transfer Switch:** Square D manual safety switch, 3-position (GENSET / OFF / OPALCO)

**Distribution Panel:** Square D QO Load Center serving Beach House, Farm House, Caretaker's House, and sub-panel circuits.

**Sub-Panel:** Square D QO2-4L70S — [View Manual](https://download.schneider-electric.com/files?p_enDocType=Instruction+sheet&p_File_Name=S1B33894.pdf&p_Doc_Ref=S1B33894), 70A, 240V, Single Phase. Labeled 'CHARGE ONLY / PLUGS'.

images.caption: Handwritten switchover procedure posted on wall. TO GENERATOR: 1. Turn on OPALCO flood light, 2. Turn main switch off, 3. Start generator - warm up, 4. Turn main switch to gen-set. TO OPALCO: 1. Turn main switch to off, 2. Turn off generator, 3. Turn main switch to OPALCO, 4. Turn off OPALCO flood light.
Square D safety switch / manual transfer switch. 3-position handle: GENSET (top), OFF (middle), OPALCO (bottom). Square D Company label with DANGER warning.
Square D QO Load Center breaker panel (open). Main Principal breaker at top. Circuit directory serves Beach House, Farm House, Caretaker's House, and various outlets/circuits.
Square D QO Load Center sub-panel, catalog QO2-4L70S, single phase, 240V, 70A max. Single breaker in I/ON position. Written on wall above: 'CHARGE ONLY' and 'PLUGS'.

sections.title: Fire Suppression
sections.description: Property-wide fire suppression system with a 10,000-gallon reservoir and a 6-inch hydrant standpipe. This is an insurance requirement.

subsections.title: System Overview
subsections.content:
**Insurance Requirement:** This system is a requirement for property insurance.

**System Components:**
- 10,000-gallon dedicated water reservoir tank.
- 6-inch underground supply line.
- 6-inch galvanized fire hydrant standpipe.

images.caption: 6-inch galvanized fire hydrant standpipe with elbow fitting, on a concrete/gravel pad with access hatch. Located on gravel drive area among conifers.
10,000-gallon water reservoir tank for fire suppression. Large dark horizontal cylindrical tank elevated on steel/concrete cradle supports among the trees.
Exterior view of the pump shed, a small building with a shake roof and vertical board siding.
Overview of the narrow interior, showing the water softener, salt bags, heaters, well head, and electrical panels.

subsections.title: Well & Water Treatment Equipment

images.caption: The floor-mounted wellhead with a pitless adapter and brass fittings. A crack is visible in the concrete slab near the well head.
The pump control boxes, including a Franklin Electric Submersible Motor Control and a SymCom PumpSaver Model SP-23. A Spectrum Water Analysis Test Kit is sitting on top.
The water treatment system, including two large fiberglass tanks, a black brine tank, and an extensive PVC piping manifold.
The property-wide water distribution manifold with multiple PVC branch lines and red-handled ball valves.
Two North Star Commercial Universal Control panels for the water softening system. The left unit shows a water flow rate of 2.0 GPM.

subsections.content:
**Well & Water Treatment Equipment:**

- **Well Pump Motor Control:** Franklin Electric Submersible Motor Control — [AIM Manual](https://www.geotechenv.com/Manuals/Franklin_AIM/Electric_Submersible_Motors_AIM.pdf)
- **Pump Protector:** SymCom PumpSaver Model SP-23 (233P) — [View Manual](https://www.xylem.com/siteassets/brand/goulds-water-technology/resources/manual/ii_233p-111p-233p-1.5_a1.pdf)
- **Water Softener Controllers:** North Star Commercial Universal Control (x2) — [Owner's Manuals](https://northstarwater.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/categories/4403157826455-Owner-s-Manuals)
- **Distribution Manifold:** Multiple PVC branch lines with red-handled ball valves

> **Maintenance Note:** A crack is visible in the concrete slab near the well head — monitor and repair as needed.

subsections.title: Electrical

images.caption: The main Square D QO electrical panel (200A) for the pump shed, with circuits for the pump, controls, and other buildings.

subsections.content:
**Electrical Panel:** Square D QO Load Center, 200A — [View Manual](https://download.schneider-electric.com/files?p_enDocType=Instruction+sheet&p_File_Name=S1B33894.pdf&p_Doc_Ref=S1B33894)

The panel serves the pump, controls, and other buildings on the property.
